visual_style_summary: Ethereal and cinematic aesthetic characterized by soft-focus backgrounds, warm golden hues, and crisp white accents. The lighting emphasizes the brilliance and facets of the diamond and metal details, with a subtle glow that highlights craftsmanship and luxury.

scenes.description: A macro close-up shot from above of the Nomi Bridal Ring Set, focusing on the center diamond and square halo, capturing the interplay of facets and sparkle against a soft background.
scenes.lighting_setup: Cinematic diffused golden light with soft highlights to enhance brilliance, creating a warm, inviting glow. Gentle fill light to maintain clarity on intricate details.

scenes.description: Transition to a subtle slow rotation around the ring, revealing both the warm yellow gold and white accents, emphasizing contrast and craftsmanship.
scenes.lighting_setup: Consistent warm diffused lighting with gentle highlights on metal surfaces to accentuate dual-tone finish.
focus_points: Yellow gold and white accents contrast
Facets of the diamond in motion

technical_notes: Lighting is calibrated to mimic cinematic golden hour, emphasizing the brilliance and refraction within the diamond facets. Soft diffusion ensures a luxurious glow without harsh reflections. The macro lens captures the intricate craftsmanship, with rotation providing a dynamic view of the textures and color contrasts. The scene relies on the physical properties of diamonds for scintillation and refraction, while metals showcase specular highlights and polished textures.
